name: ACMC 2022
content: A unique platform for students and young professionals working in arts and cultural management across Europe to meet, exchange knowledge and learn from one another, as well as high-profile industry professionals. ACMC allows for a more insightful and practical view on the arts and culture sector in Europe through a rich programme of paper presentations, poster exhibitions, talks and Q&As, and interactive sessions. The ACMC team provides and monitors the communication channels for the delivery of the online event, content share and networking.
